20101210140128.000|20101210140131.333|TR0|ceremony has been held without
20101210140131.333|20101210140134.667|TR0|the winner. There is growing
20101210140134.667|20101210140138.000|TR0|anger from the Chinese
20101210140138.000|20101210140141.333|TR0|government over giving the prize
20101210140141.333|20101210140144.667|TR0|to human rights advocate Lui
20101210140144.667|20101210140148.000|TR0|Xiaobo.
20101210140148.000|20101210140151.333|TR0|
20101210140151.333|20101210140154.667|TR0|The pro-democracy activist is
20101210140154.667|20101210140158.000|TR0|serving an 11-year sentence for
20101210140158.000|20101210140201.333|TR0|subversion. Chinese authorities
20101210140201.333|20101210140204.667|TR0|have not only banned him, but
20101210140204.667|20101210140208.000|TR0|also his wife from attending the
20101210140208.000|20101210140211.333|TR0|ceremony in Norway. Almost a

20101210140218.000|20101210140220.500|TR0|away, including Russia, Saudi
20101210140220.500|20101210140223.000|TR0|Arabia and Pakistan. Russian
20101210140223.000|20101210140225.500|TR0|officials have even suggested

20101210140234.667|20101210140238.000|TR0|And while Washington is hunting

20101210142018.000|20101210142021.333|TR0|
20101210142021.333|20101210142024.667|TR0|In India's eastern state of

20101210142031.333|20101210142034.667|TR0|infection, yet it still takes
20101210142034.667|20101210142038.000|TR0|more lives in India than HIV.
20101210142038.000|20101210142041.333|TR0|SBRavi Shankar Kumar - Relative
20101210142041.333|20101210142044.667|TR0|Malaria has spread everywhere
20101210142044.667|20101210142048.000|TR0|near our village. No medical
20101210142048.000|20101210142051.333|TR0|teams come to help us and
20101210142051.333|20101210142054.667|TR0|hospitals are far away. Poor
20101210142054.667|20101210142058.000|TR0|people like us are dying. At
20101210142058.000|20101210142101.333|TR0|this hospital in Patna, many

20101210142104.667|20101210142108.000|TR0|infection. SB Rani Devi -
20101210142108.000|20101210142111.333|TR0|Patient I have a very high
20101210142111.333|20101210142114.667|TR0|temperature, and I think I have
20101210142114.667|20101210142118.000|TR0|malaria. Ive come to the doctor

20101210142120.500|20101210142123.000|TR0|people in my neighbourhood have
20101210142123.000|20101210142125.500|TR0|malaria. A study has found that
20101210142125.500|20101210142128.000|TR0|malaria kills more than 13 times
20101210142128.000|20101210142131.333|TR0|the number of people currently
20101210142131.333|20101210142134.667|TR0|estimated by the World Health
20101210142134.667|20101210142138.000|TR0|Organisation. Since many malaria
20101210142138.000|20101210142141.333|TR0|deaths occur at home and in
20101210142141.333|20101210142144.667|TR0|rural areas - they dont get
20101210142144.667|20101210142148.000|TR0|recorded. So researchers visited
20101210142148.000|20101210142151.333|TR0|families and asked them to
20101210142151.333|20101210142154.667|TR0|describe what had happened to
20101210142154.667|20101210142158.000|TR0|the victims - a method known as
20101210142158.000|20101210142201.333|TR0|a verbal autopsy. SB Prof.
20101210142201.333|20101210142204.667|TR0|Prabhat Jha - Director, Centre
20101210142204.667|20101210142208.000|TR0|for Global Health Research,
20101210142208.000|20101210142211.333|TR0|University of Toronto [00:02:25]
20101210142211.333|20101210142214.667|TR0|We estimated that something like
20101210142214.667|20101210142218.000|TR0|4% of the deaths between 1 month
20101210142218.000|20101210142221.333|TR0|of life and 69 years of age were
20101210142221.333|20101210142224.667|TR0|due to malaria. And if you
20101210142224.667|20101210142228.000|TR0|multiply that percentage by the
20101210142228.000|20101210142230.500|TR0|national number of deaths at
20101210142230.500|20101210142233.000|TR0|those ages, you get 200,000
20101210142233.000|20101210142235.500|TR0|deaths before age 70 in India.
20101210142235.500|20101210142238.000|TR0|Its a staggering number,
20101210142238.000|20101210142241.333|TR0|especially compared to the World
20101210142241.333|20101210142244.667|TR0|Health Organisations estimate
20101210142244.667|20101210142248.000|TR0|of just 15,000 annual
20101210142248.000|20101210142251.333|TR0|fatalities.  It disputes the
20101210142251.333|20101210142254.667|TR0|study, saying verbal autopsy
20101210142254.667|20101210142258.000|TR0|responders could mistake
20101210142258.000|20101210142301.333|TR0|malarias commonly-found
20101210142301.333|20101210142304.667|TR0|symptoms. SB Prof. Prabhat Jha -
20101210142304.667|20101210142308.000|TR0|Director, Centre for Global
20101210142308.000|20101210142311.333|TR0|Health Research, University of
20101210142311.333|20101210142314.667|TR0|Toronto [04.36] It is true that
20101210142314.667|20101210142318.000|TR0|you can confuse malaria deaths
20101210142318.000|20101210142321.333|TR0|with other causes of fever
20101210142321.333|20101210142324.667|TR0|However, the WHO accepts the use
20101210142324.667|20101210142328.000|TR0|of verbal autopsy for estimating
20101210142328.000|20101210142331.333|TR0|childhood deaths from malaria in
20101210142331.333|20101210142334.667|TR0|Africa. So I've been puzzled why
20101210142334.667|20101210142338.000|TR0|they would think that the method
20101210142338.000|20101210142341.333|TR0|would work in one continent, and
20101210142341.333|20101210142344.667|TR0|not 3,000 miles away in another.
20101210142344.667|20101210142348.000|TR0|Most medical staff in Indian
20101210142348.000|20101210142350.500|TR0|hospitals agree the number of
20101210142350.500|20101210142353.000|TR0|malaria deaths is far more than
20101210142353.000|20101210142355.500|TR0|the WHO figure. Piece to Camera
20101210142355.500|20101210142358.000|TR0|- Karan Singh As India faces
20101210142358.000|20101210142401.333|TR0|this killer disease, its
